name: Secrets_from_Another_Place:_Creating_Twin_Peaks
text:
Secrets from Another Place: Creating Twin Peaks
Secrets from Another Place: Creating Twin Peaks is a feature-length documentary featurette originally released in the 2007 DVD set, Twin Peaks: Definitive Gold Box Edition. It was later re-released in the Blu-ray sets, Twin Peaks: The Entire Mystery and Twin Peaks: From Z to A.
It is a behind-the-scenes documentary chronicling the making of Twin Peaks.
Contents

Northwest Passage: Creating the Pilot
The writing, casting, and production of the pilot episode are discussed.
Interviews
Mark Frost
David Latt
Johanna Ray
Sheryl Lee
Ray Wise
Kimmy Robertson
Joan Chen
Kyle MacLachlan
Michael Horse
Piper Laurie
Catherine E. Coulson
Duwayne Dunham
Freshly Squeezed: Creating Season One
The production and release of the show's first season are discussed.
Interviews
Mark Frost
Duwayne Dunham
Richard Hoover
Gregg Fienberg
Harley Peyton
Lesli Linka Glatter
Todd Holland
Ray Wise
Sherilyn Fenn
Kyle MacLachlan

Joan Chen
Catherine E. Coulson
Mädchen Amick
Miguel Ferrer
Robert Engels
Kimmy Robertson
Charlotte Stewart
Where We're From: Creating the Music
The music production of Twin Peaks is discussed.
Interviews
Angelo Badalamenti
Julee Cruise
Into the Night: Creating Season Two
The production and release of season 2, and cancellation of Twin Peaks are discussed.
